msbt.message: Dear ,
To ,
Hello, !
Hi, !
Thank you for your kind note. It made me feel cared about.
Thanks so much for sending me that heartfelt message!
I've read the note you sent me over and over again.
Thanks for your sweet message. I love hearing from you.
It warmed my heart that you'd take the time to write to me.
I've been sitting here, trying to come up with the perfect reply. But I'm sending this one instead.
Do you get nervous writing a note? I know it's the thought that counts, but I want the words to count too!
Your gesture made me happy, so I knew I needed to write you back. I want you to know I appreciated it.
It makes me feel good when anyone takes the time to write to me. I kept every note passed to me in school!
Talking in person is nice, but being able to read and re-read a note like yours is like a special gift in itself.
I'll be waiting for your next note.
That's it from me this time.
Let's chat again sometime soon!
Hope you have a great day!
Write to me again anytime!
From
Sincerely,
All my heart,
Take care,
